decelerations (5).
Very slow FHR in the 
absence of contractions 
or persisting after 
contractions is suggestive 
of fetal distress (9).
If Late decelerations 
or a single prolonged 
deceleration are present, 
ask the woman to turn 
on her left side, then 
perform a prolong 
auscultation, alert a 
senior care provider and 
follow clinical guidelines.
If No decelerations 
are present, continue 
monitoring FHR every 
30 minutes during the 
first stage and every 
5 minutes during the 
seco
